import React, { useState } from 'react' const MultipleInputs = () => { const [userRegistration, setUserRegistration] = useState({ username: "", age: "", address: "", about: "" }); const handleInput = (e) => { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; console.log(name, value); setUserRegistration({ ...userRegistration, [name]: value }); } return ( <>

) } export default MultipleInputs;
